definition: picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily/crying over spilt milk/often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues

sentences.english: Behind the thick lens of her glasses her blue-green eyes 3)clouded with concern.
sentences.chinese: 透過厚厚的眼鏡片，她那藍綠色的眼睛滿是擔憂。

sentences.english: The industrial park development caused the society to the misgiving of the ecosystem and environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 工業園區的發展引起了社會對生態環境保護的擔憂。

sentences.english: First is concern over the implications of Summers' ouster for an incoming president.
sentences.chinese: 首先是對驅逐薩莫斯校長迎來新校長的擔憂。

sentences.english: This policy brief is an attempt to put concerns relating to potential allergenicity into perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本篇政策摘要將透視對潛在過敏性的擔憂。

sentences.english: We’ve all heard about the Earth’s temperature rising at an alarming rate.
sentences.chinese: 我們都聽說了地球的溫度在以令人擔憂的速度上升。

sentences.english: In a big hug east Juan home had big li habit very worried.
sentences.chinese: 擁東在大娟家的惡習表現讓大麗很擔憂。
對於過度監管的擔憂消失了。

sentences.english: 60-year old Ren Jinxiang is among the anxious farmers.
sentences.chinese: 60歲的任金祥老人是擔憂的農民之一。

sentences.english: Son of man KongZhu dream Dan by other seduce, woke up very worried.
sentences.chinese: 孫子夢到丹孔珠被別的男人勾引，醒來之後非常擔憂。

sentences.english: Recently, he worried about a case of lead poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他正擔憂着一樁鉛中毒案件。

sentences.english: Do you worry abot acne on your face?
sentences.chinese: 你擔憂你臉上的粉刺嗎？

sentences.english: Tanya: I assume we don't need to worry about creating a need, with summer almost here.
sentences.chinese: 我想夏季就要惠臨，我們不用再爲締造需求而擔憂。

sentences.english: More concerning is the presence of additives in some types of commercially prepared kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 更讓人擔憂的是韓國泡菜中的食品添加劑。

sentences.english: The president was alarmed by the drift toward catastrophe in europe.
sentences.chinese: 總統對歐洲動盪的時局甚爲擔憂。

sentences.english: Alarmingly, of women who develop the disease, 55% have no known risk factors.
sentences.chinese: 令人擔憂的是55%患病的人不知原因。

sentences.english: But don’t worry; God never blinks.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要擔憂，上帝不眨眼。

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to be deeply concerned/to be troubled (by)
